title: INSIGHT: Italians attend 'Battle of the Oranges'
text:
INSIGHT: Italians attend 'Battle of the Oranges' Sunday, February 11, 2018 - 00:42 
Thousands of Italians turn out for a medieval citrus bash during carnival season's 'Battle of the Oranges'.The event, which dates back to medieval times, took place in the northern Italian city of Ivrea. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Thousands of Italians turn out for a medieval citrus bash during carnival season's 'Battle of the Oranges'. The event, which dates back to medieval times, took place in the northern Italian city of Ivrea.
